ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Epic - vial
ygData.msgSnippet: there is a guy in Qhills that if you kill him over and over for like an hour or so you can go down there and get the vial but it screws up your caster faction
ygData.messageBody:
there is a guy in Qhills that if you kill him over and
over for like an hour or so you can go down there and
get the vial but it screws up your caster faction in
quynos.........thats how i got my vial


--- Paul Jesernig <pwjesernig@...> wrote:
> I am having troubles myself with that part of
> myself, soemthing I did ruined
> my faction with the Qeynos necro guild. I am going
> to try and chain that
> part of the quest, I have a few evil friends that
> say they have no problems
> down there.
>
> Lozi ~Hand of Chaos~ CT
